meanings.sent1: The hurricane will devastate the small town.
meanings.sent2: The earthquake could devastate the entire city.
meanings.sent3: The news of the canceled concert will devastate many fans.
meanings.sent4: The wildfire has the potential to devastate the forest.
meanings.sent5: The floodwaters will devastate the farmland if not controlled.

meanings.definition: To overwhelm or shock with great sadness or disappointment
meanings.sent1: Losing the championship game will devastate the team.
meanings.sent2: The sudden loss of a loved one can devastate a family.
meanings.sent3: The spoiled surprise party plan will devastate the birthday girl.
meanings.sent4: The failed experiment results will devastate the scientist.
meanings.sent5: The rejection letter from the dream college will devastate the student.
